front.title: YANG Data Model for DHCPv6 Configuration

abstract.t: There has no unified method to configure DHCPv6 server ,relay and client itself, always pre-configured manually by operators. IETF netmod WG has developed a general data model for NETCONF protocol, YANG data model [RFC6020]. This document defines a YANG data model for the configuration and management of DHCPv6 server, DHCPv6 relay and DHCPv6 client. With this model, the operators can configure and manage the devices by using NETCONF.
